skill_constraints: Single points of failure in Backend and DevOps roles.
resource_bottlenecks: Backend Lead availability for security-critical tasks and reviews.
mitigation_strategies: Aggressive cross-training, meticulous documentation, and strict adherence to sprint priorities.

skill_constraints: Onboarding and integration overhead for new resource.
resource_bottlenecks: Minimized bottlenecks, improved parallel work capacity.
mitigation_strategies: Add a Mid-level Backend Developer to offload tasks from the Backend Lead and create redundancy.
